name: desaidn.dev
description: Personal portfolio website with React frontend and AWS CDK infrastructure

scripts.deploy:prepare: pnpm --filter @desaidn.dev/assets build && pnpm --filter @desaidn.dev/cdk cdk synth && pnpm --filter @desaidn.dev/cdk cdk diff
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:prepare && pnpm --filter @desaidn.dev/cdk cdk deploy
